name: Delego Software
tag_list: electronic-payment, pci-compliance, pci-dss, sap-certified, sap, payment-security, credit-card-integration, e-commerce, payment-card, tokenization, payment-processing, asug
overview:
Delego Software Inc. is a certified SAP Partner providing data encryption and tokenization technologies, integrated software applications and professional services to corporations worldwide.

Delego specializes in software solutions that integrate electronic payment processing systems with SAP enterprise software. Delego solutions capture and securely communicate electronic payment transaction data from customer to clearinghouse to the merchant’s SAP enterprise system.

Originally incorporated in 1999 as an SAP consulting business, Delego has evolved into a full service integrator of its proprietary suite of applications serving more than 100 major corporations worldwide. The company has been an SAP Software Partner since 2000 and is also a member of the Americas SAP User Group, ASUG. Delego has given many payment related presentations at ASUG events and has participated in SAP events around the world. Delego was selected to be the only Electronics Payment solution listed in the SAP Packaged Solutions catalog for both North America and the United Kingdom.

Delego Software Inc. is one of the largest suppliers of SAP integrated applications for payment cards with customers in North America, South America, Europe and Australia. Delego has succeeded in this niche market by concentrating exclusively on the needs of SAP users, by offering flexible middleware solutions, by developing a broad range of acquirer and processor connections, and by being responsive to customers’ needs. Delego also provides end users with the flexibility to support their own in-house solution or to acquire our software as a service through two major hosted solution business partners, CyberSource Inc. and First Data Corporation.
